title: Ardour 8.2 Open-Source DAW Adds Note Tupling, Support for Solid State Logic UF8
description:
Ardour 8.2 open-source and free digital audio workstation is now available for download with support for Novation LaunchPad X and LaunchPad Mini controllers, as well as new features and improvements.

The post Ardour 8.2 Open-Source DAW Adds Note Tupling, Support for Solid State Logic UF8 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
